0: AN ACT TO ENCOURAGE AND FACILITATE INFORMATION SHARING BETWEEN THE AGENCIES OF THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT IN ORDER TO PROTECT THE PHILIPPINES AGAINST ACTIVITIES THAT UNDERMINE ITS SECURITY
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07834
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ENCOURAGE AND FACILITATE INFORMATION SHARING BETWEEN THE AGENCIES OF THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT IN ORDER TO PROTECT THE PHILIPPINES AGAINST ACTIVITIES THAT UNDERMINE ITS SECURITY
ABSTRACT : Recognizes that information needs to be shared – and – disparate ones need to be efficiently collated to enable the Government to protect the Philippines from activities that undermines its sovereignty, security or territorial integrity or the lives and security of the Filipino people; Enumerates guiding principles for information sharing under this Act, the activities that poses a threat to the security of the country, and the powers of the Director-General of the National Intelligence Coordinating Agency.
ALIAS NAME : “ National Information Sharing Act ”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY ON 2018-07-30
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY
